headline: Tariffs meant to protect U.S. chocolate are melting it instead
summary: Canadian and Mexican manufacturers are thriving as U.S. tariffs drive chocolate production over the border.

raw.headline: Tariffs meant to protect U.S. chocolate are melting it instead
raw.summary: Canadian and Mexican manufacturers are thriving as U.S. tariffs drive chocolate production over the border.

headline: Hershey beats quarterly estimates on strong Easter demand
summary: STORY: U.S. chocolate maker Hershey beat analysts' sales and profit estimates for the second quarter on Wednesday, driven by strong Easter demand for its sweets and steady growth for its salty snacks.Shares of the company rose as much as almost 7% in morning trading, but gave back some gains by midday.Hershey said sales volume rose about 21%, due to planned changes in its inventory and supply chain in the North America Confectionery and International segments.But U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs are skyrocketing the cost of importing already-pricey cocoa and hurting the competitiveness of American factories.Hershey has estimated it could face up to $180 million in tariff costs this year.Under pressure from rising costs, earlier this month, Hershey rolled out double-digit price hikes across its confectionery products including Reese's cups to retailers like Walmart and Kroger.

raw.headline: Hershey beats quarterly estimates on strong Easter demand
raw.summary: STORY: U.S. chocolate maker Hershey beat analysts' sales and profit estimates for the second quarter on Wednesday, driven by strong Easter demand for its sweets and steady growth for its salty snacks.Shares of the company rose as much as almost 7% in morning trading, but gave back some gains by midday.Hershey said sales volume rose about 21%, due to planned changes in its inventory and supply chain in the North America Confectionery and International segments.But U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs are skyrocketing the cost of importing already-pricey cocoa and hurting the competitiveness of American factories.Hershey has estimated it could face up to $180 million in tariff costs this year.Under pressure from rising costs, earlier this month, Hershey rolled out double-digit price hikes across its confectionery products including Reese's cups to retailers like Walmart and Kroger.

headline: Hershey (HSY) Reports Lower Earnings But Announces Exciting REESE'S and OREO Collaboration
summary: Hershey (HSY) recently unveiled its Q2 2025 earnings, showing substantial sales growth but a significant dip in net income and earnings per share. Despite the earnings decline, the company's stock price rose by 12% over the past month, aligning with broader market trends. Key factors could include the announcement of new REESE'S and OREO product innovations and the transition in leadership with Kirk Tanner taking over as CEO. headline: LG & Tesla, Hershey trims outlook, Peloton upgraded
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. LG (373220.KS) reportedly signed a $4.3 billion battery supply deal with Tesla (TSLA), according to Reuters.  Hershey (HSY) beat earnings expectations thanks to strong Easter candy sales, but lowered its full-year outlook due to tariff costs. Peloton (PTON) stock jumps after UBS upgraded the stock to Buy from Neutral, citing subscription price hikes and signs of stabilizing subscriber trends. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Hershey (HSY) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of chocolate company Hershey (NYSE:HSY) jumped 3.2% in the morning session after the company reported second-quarter earnings and revenue that significantly surpassed Wall Street expectations. The chocolate maker posted revenue of $2.61 billion, a 26% increase from the prior year, and adjusted earnings of $1.21 per share, both of which significantly surpassed analyst forecasts. headline: The REESE'S and OREO® Brands Announce Iconic Collaboration, Finally Giving Fans What They Have Been Asking For

Introducing the REESE'S OREO® Cup and the OREO® REESE'S Cookie—a two-way delicious mash-up between America's #1 Candy and #1 Cookie.

headline: Hershey (NYSE:HSY) Reports Strong Q2
summary: Chocolate company Hershey (NYSE:HSY) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 26% year on year to $2.61 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.21 per share was 20.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Hershey: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Hershey, Pennsylvania-based company said it had profit of 31 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, came to $1.21 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.
